name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Filter Social Noise - Mute words, block annoying tweets and Ads
name.ja: Twitter用キーワードブロッカー

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Block keywords, block annoying tweets by customized keywords, support twitter.com and weibo.com now, and more is coming soon.
short.de: Blockieren Sie Schlüsselwörter, blockieren Sie störende Tweets durch angepasste Schlüsselwörter, unterstützt derzeit twitter.com…
short.fr: Bloquez les mots-clés, bloquez les tweets ennuyeux par des mots-clés personnalisés, supporte actuellement twitter.com et weibo.com,…
short.hi: कीवर्ड्स को ब्लॉक करें, कस्टमाइज़्ड कीवर्ड्स द्वारा कष्टप्रद ट्वीट्स को ब्लॉक करें, अभी के लिए twitter.com और weibo.com का समर्थन…
short.ja: カスタマイズされたキーワードによって望ましくないツイートをブロックします。現在、twitter.comとweibo.comをサポートしており、もっと多くのサポートが間もなく提供されます。
short.ko: 사용자 정의된 키워드로 원치 않는 트윗을 차단합니다. 현재 twitter.com과 weibo.com을 지원하며, 곧 더 많은 지원이 제공될 예정입니다.
short.zh_CN: 自动过滤社交噪音， 通过自定义关键字来屏蔽不想看到的内容。 目前支持推特、微博、油管youtube和脸书facebook, 即将支持更多的社交网站。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Filter Social Noise is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your social media experience by eliminating unwanted distractions. Whether you're browsing Twitter or Weibo, we understand that social media noise and interference can be overwhelming. This is where Filter Social Noise comes to your rescue.

Key Features:

Keyword Filtering: Filter Social Noise allows you to create a customized list of keywords, enabling you to block content that doesn't interest you. Whether it's annoying topics, political debates, or advertisements, simply add the keywords to your list, and watch them disappear.

Supports Twitter and Weibo: The extension currently supports Twitter.com and Weibo.com, making it easy to filter out social noise on these platforms.

Support quick one-click keyword blocking for selected words

Support batch import and export of blocked words

Support automatic synchronization to Twitter backend

More Support Coming Soon: We are continuously working to expand our support to more social media platforms. You can look forward to Filter Social Noise helping you purify your experience on other social networks.

Install Filter Social Noise and Reclaim Your Social Freedom!

No more distractions from social media noise—focus on the content that matters to you. Install Filter Social Noise and elevate the quality of your social media browsing experience.

Install Filter Social Noise Now

Note: Filter Social Noise respects your privacy and does not collect or store your personal information. The extension is designed to provide a cleaner, more valuable social media browsing experience.

long.zh_CN:
Filter Social Noise 是一款强大的 Chrome 插件，旨在帮助您享受更清爽的社交媒体体验。无论您是在 Twitter 还是微博上浏览，我们都明白社交媒体上的噪音和干扰可能让您感到不适。这正是 Filter Social Noise 的用武之地。

主要特点：

关键字过滤： Filter Social Noise 允许您自定义关键字列表，从而屏蔽您不感兴趣的内容。无论是烦人的话题、政治辩论还是广告，只需将关键字添加到列表中，即可清除它们。

支持 Twitter 和微博： 插件目前已支持 Twitter.com 和 Weibo.com，让您在这些平台上轻松过滤社交噪音。

支持选词进行快速一键屏蔽关键字
支持批量导入导出屏蔽词
支持自动同步到twitter后台

更多支持即将推出： 我们一直在努力，将支持更多社交媒体平台。您可以期待 Filter Social Noise 帮助您净化其他社交体验。

安装 Filter Social Noise，并重获社交自由！

不再被社交噪音干扰，专注于您真正关心的内容。安装 Filter Social Noise，提高您的社交媒体体验质量。

立即安装 Filter Social Noise

注意：Filter Social Noise 尊重您的隐私，并不会收集或存储您的个人信息。该插件旨在提供更干净、更有价值的社交媒体浏览体验。
